titles.title: Brownfields Redevelopment Promotion Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permanently extend the deduction for environmental remediation costs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 10/18/2007--Introduced. Brownfields Redevelopment Promotion Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make permanent the taxpayer election to expense (deduct in the current taxable year) expenditures made for environmental remediation (i.e., abatement or control of hazardous substances at contaminated sites).
